ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.

Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.

name: r-ggspectra
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.17" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggspectra
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggspectra_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggspectra/ggspectra_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f24faa9fe4b59ecd39533f9e28e43b08f3f7ff00273fb61d2b7e58d6a27b7d17

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.5.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.9.2
    - r-lubridate >=1.9.0
    - r-photobiology >=0.13.1
    - r-photobiologywavebands >=0.5.2
    - r-rlang >=1.0.2
    - r-scales >=1.2.0
    - r-tibble >=3.1.5
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.5.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.9.2
    - r-lubridate >=1.9.0
    - r-photobiology >=0.13.1
    - r-photobiologywavebands >=0.5.2
    - r-rlang >=1.0.2
    - r-scales >=1.2.0
    - r-tibble >=3.1.5

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggspectra')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggspectra')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.r4photobiology.info, https://bitbucket.org/aphalo/ggspectra
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P.
    J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ggspectra
# Type: Package
# Title: Extensions to 'ggplot2' for Radiation Spectra
# Version: 0.3.4
# Date: 2019-09-11
# Authors@R:  c( person("Pedro J.", "Aphalo", email = "pedro.aphalo@helsinki.fi", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-3385-972X")), person("Titta K.", "Kotilainen", role = "ctb", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-2822-9734")) )
# Maintainer: Pedro J. Aphalo <pedro.aphalo@helsinki.fi>
# Description: Additional annotations, stats, geoms and scales for plotting  "light" spectra with 'ggplot2', together with specializations of ggplot() and autoplot() methods for spectral data and waveband definitions stored in objects of classes defined in package 'photobiology'. Part of the  'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: TRUE
# LazyLoad: TRUE
# ByteCompile: TRUE
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0), photobiology (>= 0.9.29), ggplot2 (>= 3.1.1)
# Imports: photobiologyWavebands (>= 0.4.3), scales (>= 1.0.0), ggrepel (>= 0.8.1), dplyr (>= 0.8.1), lubridate (>= 1.7.4), tidyr (>= 0.8.3)
# Suggests: knitr (>= 1.24), rmarkdown (>= 1.15)
# URL: https://www.r4photobiology.info, https://bitbucket.org/aphalo/ggspectra

# Date/Publication: 2019-09-12 16:50:02 UTC
